snippet.title: Shrek Playtime is Ogre 2 RELEASE TRAILER
snippet.description:
10 years after the first game I have made a sequel to it. Download it below. Fair forewarning though: This game is hard as balls. If you actually manage to beat "the shrek challenge", do let me know!

Download from Gamejolt:
https://gamejolt.com/games/shrekplaytimeisogre2/899189
Download from Itch.io:
https://ryemanni.itch.io/shrek-playtime-is-ogre-2

Visit my website for more games:
https://www.ryemanni.com/

Trailer music by RoccoW
